subject: Nascar Sprint Cup Series
Automobile Racing
organizations: National Assn of Stock Car Auto Racing
lead_paragraph: Juan Pablo Montoya won the pole for the Nascar Sprint Cup race at Richmond International Raceway on Saturday, turning a fast lap at 128.639 miles per hour on the 0.75-mile oval.
snippet: Juan Pablo Montoya won the pole for the Nascar Sprint Cup race at Richmond International Raceway on Saturday, turning a fast lap at 128.639 miles per hour on the 0.75-mile oval.
